detaileddescription.para: The NAV Application is responsible for safely navigating or moving the vehicle from one location to another.

listitem.para: Reads position, vehicle status, and land detection data to generate position setpoint triplet for commanded action.
This message has enough information for a vehicle to move from one position to another.
The message is published on the software bus which is then received by MPC.

detaileddescription.para: Prev: NAV Application Introduction Next: NAV Application Operation
